section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor may promulgate rules consistent with this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 3-405, § 3-406, and § 3-407.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 2(c) of Funeral Services Temporary Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Law 13-219, April 3, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 3461).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2(c) of Funeral Services Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-8, March 2, 2001, 48 DCR 2487).
